CustomField.description: US-0009221 - [Ads 2020] Field & Formulas for Revenue Recognition and Compliance
CustomField.formula:
IF(Company_Code__c = "0062" && Country_Code__c = "DE", "A4", IF(Company_Code__c = "0062" && locatedInEU__c = TRUE, "B1", IF(Company_Code__c = "0062" && locatedInEU__c = FALSE, "A7", IF(Company_Code__c = "0075" && Country_Code__c = "UK", "A9", IF(Company_Code__c = "0075" && Country_Code__c <> "UK", "A7", IF(Company_Code__c = "0111" && Country_Code__c <> "UK", "A7",
"#NA#" ))))))
CustomField.label: VAT Code
